original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū satthapāṇissa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū sattha pāṇissa dhammaṃ desenti pe

original: “Na satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na sattha pāṇissa a gilānassa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
na sattha pāṇissa a gilānassa dhammaḥ desetabbaḥ

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca sattha pāṇissa a gilānassa dhammam deseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
